description:
Don’t put off life insurance. Make it easy with Policygenius. Head to https://policygenius.com/SCISHOW

We've learned a lot about Megalodon by studying its terrifying teeth. But we’re just beginning to understand what made this ancient shark so huge. 

Hosted by: Jaida Elcock (she/her)

title: What Made Megalodon So Freakin' Big?
